About Me


Hi, I am Hanqing Wang - a third-year Ph.D. student of Media Computing and Intelligent Systems Lab, Beijing Institute of Technology - Beijing. I am now advised by Prof. Wei Liang and Prof. Mingtao Pei. I also collaborate with Prof. Lap-Fai(Craig) Yu - director of Design Computing and Extended Reality Group, George Mason University - Virginia. I did my internship at Microsoft Research Asia, VC Group from Mar. 2017 to Nov. 2017, mentored by researcher Jiaolong Yang. I was a research intern at Inception Institute of Artificial Intelligence (IIAI) from Jul. 2019 to Apr. 2020, advised by Prof. Jianbing Shen, the lead scientist of the lab.

My research interests are Computer Vision/Graphics and Machine Learning.
